trans-unit.source: Handles <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> subelements that do not have specific implementations or handlers registered on the machine.
trans-unit.target: 처리 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"> </xref> 특정 구현이 나 처리기 컴퓨터에 등록 하지 않은 하위 요소.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> subelements with specific implementations are <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoName>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data>.

For more information about the `<KeyInfo>` element, see Section 4.4 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 자세한 내용은 `<KeyInfo>` 요소 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/에는 W3C에서 사용할 수 있는 XMLDSIG 사양의 섹션 4.4 참조 또는 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/에는 W3C에서 사용할 수 있는 XML 암호화 사양을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref> class with content taken from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"> </xref> 지정 된 위치에서 가져온 내용 사용 하 여 클래스 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An XML element from which to take the content used to create the new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 만들 때 사용한 콘텐츠를 가져오는 XML 요소 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or an XML encryption `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>이 속성에서 반환 방법은 XMLDSIG 또는 XML 암호화 하위로 사용 하기에 적합 한 `<KeyInfo>` 요소.</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref> to match.
trans-unit.target: 입력을 구문 분석 <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> 의 내부 상태를 구성 하 고는 <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"> </xref> 일치 하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that specifies the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
Gets or sets the XML content of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
The XML content of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
